Directions
In a small (2 quart) heavy-bottomed sauce pot, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add sweet rice flour.
Elizabeth Barbone
Cook, whisking constantly, for 5 minutes. If using butter, roux will darken and become reddish; if not, roux will remain pale.
For a white sauce:
Add milk, in a slow and steady steam. Whisking constantly, heat sauce until it thickens, about three minutes. Season to taste.
